content: this crochet cosmetics bag pattern is super cute and simple no zippers drawstrings or snaps to worry about you just crochet two matching handles and tie them together to secure whatever you decide to put inside please note that there is an ad-free pdf version of this pattern that can be purchased from my ravelry store to view the free version go to https //www caabcrochet com/crochet-cosmetics-bag-pattern/ materials -i love this cotton weight 4 worsted 100% cotton 153yds/140m 3oz/85g sunlit seafoam 2 skeins approx 210 yards used -us i / 5 5 mm crochet hook -yarn needle -scissors -stitch markers finished size 10 5 wide x 11 5 tall including handles abbreviation key chain chain st stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet
